title: Would You Attend Your Friend's Wedding If You Knew *This* About Them?
description:
A friend of Moe's was invited to a wedding outside of the country. The problem is her friend is already showing signs of the marriage not going well. Would you still spend all that money to travel to a wedding you know won't last?
